1521.verse: قِيلَ|It was said,|98|109|97$يَـٰنُوحُ|"O Nuh!|75|97|8453$ٱهْبِطْ|Go down|77|99|8527$بِسَلَـٰمٍ|with peace|93|115|8528$مِّنَّا|from Us|70|92|1169$وَبَرَكَـٰتٍ|and blessings|108|130|8529$عَلَيْكَ|on you|71|82|2245$وَعَلَىٰٓ|and on|77|104|67$أُمَمٍ|the nations|95|148|5580$مِّمَّن|from those|91|144|1061$مَّعَكَ‌ۚ|with you.|82|136|4385$وَأُمَمٌ|But (to other) nations|166|193|8530$سَنُمَتِّعُهُمْ|We will grant enjoyment;|186|193|8531$ثُمَّ|then|50|63|293$يَمَسُّهُم|will touch them|121|134|8532$مِّنَّا|from Us|70|83|1169$عَذَابٌ|a punishment|108|121|72$أَلِيمٌ|painful."|73|80|93$

1525.verse: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ|And O my people!|137|146|8445$ٱسْتَغْفِرُواْ|Ask forgiveness|123|141|8360$رَبَّكُمْ|(of) your Lord,|117|135|6461$ثُمَّ|then|50|68|293$تُوبُوٓاْ|turn in repentance|143|161|8361$إِلَيْهِ|to Him.|67|76|296$يُرْسِلِ|He will send|98|115|8539$ٱلسَّمَآءَ|(from) the sky (rain)|156|190|5426$عَلَيْكُم|upon you|81|115|416$مِّدْرَارًا|(in) abundance|120|154|5427$وَيَزِدْكُمْ|and increase you|133|150|8540$قُوَّةً|(in) strength|104|132|7723$إِلَىٰ|(added) to|91|147|118$قُوَّتِكُمْ|your strength.|115|171|8541$وَلَا|And (do) not|105|161|25$تَتَوَلَّوْاْ|turn away|87|115|8542$مُجْرِمِينَ|(as) criminals."|118|118|7714$

1526.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|103|101$يَـٰهُودُ|"O Hud!|73|101|8543$مَا جِئْتَنَا|You have not brought us|185|213|8544$بِبَيِّنَةٍ|clear proofs,|103|131|6656$وَمَا|and not|71|99|46$نَحْنُ|we|62|76|103$بِتَارِكِىٓ|(will) leave|92|108|8545$ءَالِهَتِنَا|our gods|83|114|8546$عَن|on|54|85|1105$قَوْلِكَ|your saying,|101|132|8547$وَمَا|and not|71|102|46$نَحْنُ|we (are)|77|108|103$لَكَ|in you|60|76|323$بِمُؤْمِنِينَ|believers.|101|101|82$

1519.verse: He said, "O Noah, indeed he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge. Indeed, I advise you, lest you be among the ignorant."

1520.verse: [Noah] said, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers."

1521.verse: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you and upon nations [descending] from those with you. But other nations [of them] We will grant enjoyment; then there will touch them from Us a painful punishment."

1522.verse: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, [O Muhammad]. You knew it not, neither you nor your people, before this. So be patient; indeed, the [best] outcome is for the righteous.

1523.verse: And to 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors [of falsehood].

1524.verse: O my people, I do not ask you for it any reward. My reward is only from the one who created me. Then will you not reason?

1525.verse: And O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in showers and increase you in strength [added] to your strength. And do not turn away, [being] criminals."

1526.verse: They said, "O Hud, you have not brought us clear evidence, and we are not ones to leave our gods on your say-so. Nor are we believers in you.
